physics_particle_group_get_angle: With this function you can retrieve the rotation (angle) in the room of a group of particles. The group value is that which was returned when you created the group of particles using the function physics_particle_group_end(), and the function will return a value which is the combined value of the currently set flags.
The above code will get the angle of the particle group indexed in the variable "group1" and store it in a variable.
